name: Can Connect
description: Returns `OK` if systemd is reachable, `CRITICAL` otherwise.

name: System State
description: Returns `OK` if systemd's system state is running, `CRITICAL` if degraded, maintenance or stopping, `UNKNOWN` if initializing, starting or other.

name: Unit Active State
description: Returns `OK` if the unit active state is active, `CRITICAL` if inactive, deactivating or failed, `UNKNOWN` if activating or other.
